#!/bin/sh #
wget -O /tmp/plugin-extensions-ansite.tar.gz "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tarekzoka/plugin-os/main/plugin-extensions-ansite.tar.gz"
tar -xzf /tmp/*.tar.gz -C /
rm -r /tmp/plugin-extensions-ansite.tar.gz
killall -9 enigma2
sleep 2;
wget -q "--no-check-certificate" https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tarekzoka/plugin-os/main/Quran/Quran.sh -O - | /bin/sh
wget -q "--no-check-certificate" https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tarekzoka/plugin-os/main/footonsat/footonsat.sh -O - | /bin/sh
#!/bin/sh #
wget -O /tmp/enigma2-plugin-extensions-multiquickbuttonfhd.deb "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tarekzoka/multiquickbut-os/main/enigma2-plugin-extensions-multiquickbuttonfhd.deb"
dpkg -i --force-overwrite /tmp/*.deb
rm -r /tmp/enigma2-plugin-extensions-multiquickbuttonfhd.deb
wait
sleep 2;
exit 0
